commit message: Started implementing a better OPML importer
Initial implementation of gpodder syncing
Made proguard strip some logs
Ensured that we always read a tag when parsing a feed so we don't exit prematurly
Updated the sync adapter. It's now syncing but needs more testing
Enabled uploading subscriptions to gpodder
More work on the gpodder syncing. Almost done. I only need to implement url rewriting on the client, and do some more testing
Updated the gpodder sync to support rewriting urls, still mostly untested
Matured the gpodder syncing quite a bit. Still some minor bugs left
Fixed a few syncing issues. Nothing critical.
Expanded number of ppossible subscription columns to 4
Fixed issue where the subscription fragment layout manager could be recreated again and again
Started making the groundwork for and immersive player
Updated retorfit to beta2
More work on the new fullscreen player
Added fragment dependentent status bar tint. Reduced the amount of overdraw by only assigning the background a color when transforming fragments
The new OPML importer is now functional
Refined the TopPlayer fullscreen mode a bit
Fixed background issue on the playlist welcome screen
Moved the FeedActivity to it's own package. Faded the text of listened podcasts in the FeedView
Did a little preparation toward reintroducing the dark theme
Updated build.gradle after rebasing
Added instruction for how to become a beta tester
Added a background to the feedview image. Fixed an outofbound regression
Started implementing a more functional feedview list. Where listened episodes are downplayed and descriptions can be expanded
More work on the enhanced FeedView list
Ensured that the downloda progress color is not the same color as the background
Moved the location of the seekbar overlay
Update the Notification on all track changes
Removed full circle when episodes were marked as listened
Removed local.properties
Updated the notification to use the NotificationCompat.MediaStyle. No testing on lower API versions yet
Fixed the playlist order.
Updated the databinding dependency
Added a background to the playlist recyclerview
mitigated crash when a downloadbutton without and episode is updated with a progress (5605d4d788f8ad5351e1eca1)
Mitigated crash when dispatching events to an uninitialized playpause button (5602917a88f8ad5351d7033b)
Mitigated a few more crashes
Bumped version to 0.110 (versioncode 182)
Updated translations
Added a 'clear' button to the notification
Worked on the automated downloader
Updated versioncode to 186
Fixed bug in the Podcast update service, and bumped version to 0.110.2 (versioncode 188)
